String.string: Ask {@LinkCreature:249#2006#Celtan} in {@Rgn:76001$$Kanstria} if he knows anything about the argon structures.
Tell {@LinkCreature:249#2006#Celtan} that you'll go to investigate the {@Rgn:49003$$Agnurok Engine}.
Speak with {@LinkCreature:249#2004#Ronalt} at the {@Rgn:49003$$Agnurok Engine} entrance.
Look for a {@LinkCreature:249#2014#teleportal} to enter the {@Rgn:9013001$$Cyasma Spire}.
Use the {@LinkCreature:249#2014#teleportal} to infiltrate the {@Rgn:9013001$$Cyasma Spire}.
You see a chamber full of cyasma coils.

Enter the Cyasma Spire.
(Follow the arrows.)
Destroy the cyasma coils in the {@Rgn:9013001$$Cyasma Spire} Transmission Device.
It looks like the primary energy transmitter.
Destroy the energy transmitter and report back to {@LinkCreature:249#2002#Ceidos} in {@Rgn:76001$$Kanstria}.
Return to Kaiator Headquarters and report what happened at {@Rgn:49001$$Argonea} to Commander {@LinkCreature:528#5005#Tamur}. (Press to use the teleport scroll you received.)
